name: Swing Man
description:
A Parkour game to make where you have to swing with a grappling hook to get to the end of the level.

Orange:Wall To Grapple

Purple: Annoying Wall That Kill You

Yellow: Bouncy Platform

Blue: Base Platform 

Controls: WASD and Space Movement, Hold left control to crouch, Hold left click on orange texture cube to grapple to release stop holding left click.
